title: Review of compressed embedding layers and their applications for recommender systems. (arXiv:2306.13724v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: We review the literature on trainable, compressed embedding layers and discuss their applicability for compressing gigantic neural recommender systems. We also report the results we measured with our compressed embedding layers.
context:
Title: Review of compressed embedding layers and their applications for recommender systems. (arXiv:2306.13724v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: We review the literature on trainable, compressed embedding layers and discuss their applicability for compressing gigantic neural recommender systems. We also report the results we measured with our compressed embedding layers.
translated_title: 可训练的压缩嵌入层及其在推荐系统上的应用综述
translated_abstract: 我们回顾了可训练的、压缩的嵌入层的文献，并讨论了它们在压缩巨型神经推荐系统方面的适用性。我们还报告了使用我们的压缩嵌入层所测得的结果。
tldr: 论文综述了可训练的、压缩的嵌入层在压缩大型神经网络推荐系统中的应用，并提供了相关实验结果。
